ElseActions.Text:
set kmInst to system attribute "KMINSTANCE"tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"	set thePath to getvariable "localInput" instance kmInstend tellset AppleScript's text item delimiters to tab
set fileList to every text item of thePath
tell application "superwhisper" to open fileList

ThenActions.Text:
set kmInst to system attribute "KMINSTANCE"tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"	set thePath to getvariable "localInput" instance kmInstend tellset AppleScript's text item delimiters to tab
set fileList to every text item of thePath
tell application "MacWhisper" to open fileList
